title: Did Saul Alinski devote "the bases of the radicalists" to Lucifer?
subtitle: Saul Alinski made a literary reference to Lucifer as "the first radical known to man" in a statement of his book "The Rules of Radicals."
author: David Emery
vclaim: The writer, Saul Allinski, dedicated the "Radio Rules" to Lucifer in 1971.
